EmailTemplate.name: 1.6.5.3 PV Training confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of your training for NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c}
Dear {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Candidate_Name__c},
I am writing to you in order to confirm the details of your training session with us.
{!HR_Event__c.Date_time_location__c}
The training session will include various lively group activities and role specific training. As some activities may take place outdoors, please wear appropriate clothing and footwear.
What do you need to bring and prepare?
Depending on which option applies to you: staff must bring ALL of the following documents for DBS verification
Option 1) You have an existing enhanced DBS dated after April 30th 2013, please bring
- Your original DBS certificate with you to training
Option 2) You have applied for a DBS through The Challenge, please bring
- Your DBS certificate (if you have received this)
- All three documents that you uploaded to process your DBS
ALL Staff must bring the following ID documents for Right To Work verification
Either A Passport (with a valid visa where appropriate) or National Identity Card;
OR Original birth certificate AND your National Insurance Card
If you do not have documents for either of these options please contact staffing.support@the-challenge.org
Click on the button below for directions to the training venue.
Get directions
We look forward to seeing you!
Best wishes,
{!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_event_Owner__c} {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c} NCS with The Challenge
CR 1.6.5.3
